name: BlackRifleCoffeeCompany
0:
”Alexa, open black rifle coffee”
”Alexa, ask black rifle coffee for top product”
”Alexa, ask black rifle coffee for shipping policy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: black rifle coffee
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Black Rifle Coffee Company is a premium, small-batch, roast-to-order, veteran-owned coffee company. We develop our explosive roast profiles with the same mission focus we learned as military members serving this great country and are committed to supporting veterans, law enforcement, and first responders.

You can use this skill to search for your favorite products and hear about our policies. 

Here's how you can open this skill 
"Alexa, open black rifle coffee". 

Once inside the skill you can ask 
- find me coffee
- Search for dark roast coffee
- What's your return policy
